CN.content:

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: As shown in Table 1 , when the active layer was PSFDTBT / PC71BM in a weight ratio of 1 : 3 , the highest PCE of 4.6% with a V oc of 0.94 V , a J sc of 8.0 mA / cm , and an FF of 0.60 was achieved.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency)
2. V oc (Open-Circuit Voltage)
3. J sc (Short-Circuit Current Density)
4. FF (Filling Factor)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. PSFDTBT (a material)
2. PC71BM (a material)
3. V oc (Open-Circuit Voltage)
4. J sc (Short-Circuit Current Density)

The entity "PCE" (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) is not a material property, but rather a performance metric that is related to the material properties of the solar cell. Therefore, I have removed it from the list.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| V oc |
| J sc |
| PC71BM |
| PSFDTBT |

PV.content:

Paragraph: As shown in Table 1 , when the active layer was PSFDTBT / PC71BM in a weight ratio of 1 : 3 , the highest PCE of 4.6% with a V oc of 0.94 V , a J sc of 8.0 mA / cm , and an FF of 0.60 was achieved.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) - 4.6%
2. V oc (Open-Circuit Voltage) - 0.94 V
3. J sc (Short-Circuit Current Density) - 8.0 mA/cm
4. FF (Filling Factor) - 0.60

These are the four property values mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property:

1. PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) - 4.6%
2. V oc (Open-Circuit Voltage) - 0.94 V

The other two entities, J sc (Short-Circuit Current Density) and FF (Filling Factor), are not directly related to the value of a material property, but rather to the performance of a solar cell device. Therefore, they are not relevant to the task of identifying material property values.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".
